item.description:
You guys asked for it so here it is....our 5th critique night!

This special evening is being hosted by Tom Seidenberg in his home in Lancaster....thank you Tom!

Here is how it works!

Please note: You need to RSVP to the event. We are limiting the number of folks who can attend. We do this so each person will have the chance to have their work critiqued...

Please bring only two images. This way everyone gets a chance to have work critiqued by everyone else. Anyone bringing more than two prints will be flogged. It's just not fair to the others. (You know who you are... )

Please feel free to bring a snack or a drink to share with the others....

The critique will end at 10 pm sharp, this is a Monday night and we all need to work in the morning! I guess that makes me the crazy time keeper lady... the last two crits - there were a lot of wonderful work and lots of great comments.

If anyone has any questions, comments - please let us know!

Cheers,



Donna and Scott
item.how_to_find_us: We should be easy to spot...
item.why: You'll be heard, and your work will be seen!

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Critique Night!
